post:
Hello again LET :)

At [VPN.sh](http://www.vpn.sh) we pride ourselves on keeping you secure online. We have a total of **13 locations**, and all accounts with us get access to all of the locations. Any new locations that we add will automatically be added to your account for you to access. We're currently lining up a couple of locations in the Asia / Oceania regions, which should be available in a couple of weeks so keep a lookout for those!

We've got some spare resources at the moment, so here we have an exclusive offer for LowEndTalk users! Also, the promotion codes are due to me starting exams tomorrow, so _wish me luck!_

**Locations:**

**100GB bandwidth across 13 locations**

>+ USA x4 (Chicago x2, Los Angeles, New Jersey)
>+ Germany x2 (Frankfurt, Dusseldorf)
>+ Canada
>+ UK
>+ Italy
>+ Switzerland
>+ Estonia
>+ Iceland
>+ Netherlands

**VPN Features:**

>* PPTP
>* L2TP/IPSec
>* OpenVPN
>* Only your bandwidth usage is logged, so to keep users on the right packages
>* Ability to use on multiple devices (Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android and more)
>* We accept PayPal, Google Checkout and Debit/Credit Cards (Stripe)

Order details: 100GB Package: **£2.50/monthly recurring** - [Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=3) - **Promotion Code: WISHMELUCKMONTHLY**

Order details: 100GB Package: **£8/semi-annually recurring** - [Order Link](https://www.vpn.sh/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=3) - **Promotion Code: WISHMELUCK**

This is completely exclusive to LowEndTalk and will not be offered anywhere else.

Thanks!

> + Visit our [Website](http://www.vpn.sh)
> + Like us on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/vpndotsh)
> + Follow us on [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/vpnsh)

_NOTE: Offers have been discussed with @Liam and @Infinity, and have been approved, despite not being VPS offers. Also please make sure you are using the correct promotion code for the correct billing cycle (Monthly/Semi-Annually)._
